amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit $150,000 from being made available for the construction of a children's playground in the Municipality of Yauco, Puerto Rico and reduce the overall cost of the bill by the same amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in part B of House Report 111-578 to prohibit $150,000 from being made available for the construction of a children's playground in the Municipality of Yauco, Puerto Rico and reduce the overall cost of the bill by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 264 (Roll no. 498).
